critique: This is an executive order that makes an exception to a rule about mandatory retirement for a government employee. It does not seem to have any significant ideological tilt. It does not address immigration. It expands executive power slightly by making an exception to a rule, but this is within the bounds of the law. It does not relate to federalism. It does not relate to national security or civil liberties. It does not relate to economic regulation. It does not relate to social inclusion.
